foursome noun [C]
(SOCIAL ACTIVITY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
(also four) a group of four people meeting for a social activity, such as playing a game or having a meal: make up a foursome Why don't we invite Caroline and Mark and make up a foursome?

foursome noun [C]
(SPORT)
a golf match for two pairs of players, in which the players in a pair hit the same ball one after the other until one of them gets it into the hole: There will be series of foursomes and singles during the tournament. Foursomes are definitely my favourite form of golf.
More examplesFewer examplesThey lost all the morning foursomes and dropped four points behind.He was my foursomes partner for a few years in international golf.She has played golf in a regular foursome for more than a decade.
